description: Assigns the Play Store (com.android.vending) as installation source to apps. Does not support Android App Bundle (splits).
subtitle: Old version.
title: Native

subtitle: Allows installation in the background without prompting for installation.
title: ROOT

description: Requires Aurora Services (com.aurora.services) installed as a system-privileged application (priv-app).
subtitle: Same benefits as the ROOT-installer.
title: Aurora Service

description: Requires App Manager (io.github.muntashirakon.AppManager). App Manager will need ADB or ROOT access if MIUI optimization is enabled.
subtitle: Submits installation files to App Manager for installation on its behalf.
title: App Manager

description: Requires Shizuku to be active. Support Android 8 and above.
subtitle: Uses Shizuku's powers.
title: Shizuku
